fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic symptoms or mucosal damage produced by the abnormal reflux.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal examination; symptoms are typically reported.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Abdominal pain, bloating, altered bowel habits.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disorder characterised by abdominal pain or discomfort and changes in bowel habit.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal physical exam, symptoms are functional.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Identify trigger foods, stress reduction techniques
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Diarrhoea, abdominal pain, weight loss, bloody stool.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic inflammatory bowel disease affecting any part of the GI tract.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic inflammatory disease of the colon with ulcers and inflammation.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness in the lower left quadrant, rectal bleeding.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Jaundice, fatigue, abdominal pain, dark urine.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Viral transmission through blood or other bodily fluids.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of liver function and viral load
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible dermatitis herpetiformis, signs of malnutrition.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Alcohol abuse, hepatitis B and C, nonalcoholic fatty liver disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: End-stage liver disease characterised by fibrosis and liver dysfunction.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Diuretics for ascites, beta-blockers for varices
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular liver function tests, screening for hepatocellular carcinoma
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Weight loss, jaundice, abdominal pain radiating to the back.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular imaging studies, CA 19-9 tumour marker monitoring
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Peptic ulcers, gastritis, oesophageal varices, colorectal cancer.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Bleeding anywhere along the GI tract.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Right upper quadrant pain, nausea, vomiting, after eating fatty foods.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Obesity, rapid weight loss, female gender.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Stones in the gallbladder, causing biliary colic.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness in right upper quadrant on palpation.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Conservative management for asymptomatic, cholecystectomy for symptoms
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe upper abdominal pain radiating to the back, nausea, vomiting.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of the pancreas with elevated pancreatic enzymes.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Avoid alcohol, gallstone removal if indicated
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: IV fluids, pain management, NPO initially
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Neuropsychiatric syndrome due to liver dysfunction and toxins.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor mental status, avoid triggers like GI bleeding
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Left lower quadrant pain, fever, leukocytosis.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation of a diverticulum in the colon.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tenderness in left lower quadrant, possibly palpable mass.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Abdominal pain, GI bleeding, palpable mass.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown; some associated with genetic mutations.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A type of tumour that occurs in the digestive tract.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible palpable abdominal mass, signs of anaemia.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Surgical resection, targeted therapy for unresectable tumours
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Imatinib for mutations in KIT gene
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Hematemesis, melena in a patient with known liver disease.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Dilated submucosal veins in the esophagus.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Signs of chronic liver disease, hypotension if bleeding.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Screening endoscopy in patients with cirrhosis, manage portal hypertension
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Mostly asymptomatic, fatigue, right upper quadrant discomfort.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Accumulation of fat in the liver cells in people who drink little or no alcohol.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Weight loss, control of diabetes and cholesterol
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular liver function tests, ultrasound or FibroScan
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A disease in which the oesophageal lining changes, becoming similar to the lining of the intestine.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Normal examination; diagnosis confirmed by endoscopy and biopsy.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: PPIs, endoscopic surveillance , endoscopic therapies for dysplasia
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Gastrin-secreting tumours (gastrinomas), usually in the pancreas or duodenum.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: High levels of gastrin leading to excessive stomach acid.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Peptic ulcers may be found on endoscopic examination.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Proton pump inhibitors, surgical removal of gastrinomas
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor gastrin levels, periodic endoscopic examination
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Early cardiovascular disease, xanthomas, corneal arcus.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Extremely high levels of LDL cholesterol due to defective LDL receptors.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Tendon xanthomas, xanthelasmas, corneal arcus in young patients.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Statins, ezetimibe, PCSK9 inhibitors, lifestyle changes
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular lipid profile monitoring, cardiovascular risk assessment
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Often asymptomatic, may present with fatigue or right upper quadrant discomfort.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A more severe form of NAFLD characterised by liver inflammation.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Weight loss and control of diabetes
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Diet, exercise, possibly vitamin E and pioglitazone for selected patients
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular liver function tests, consider liver biopsy
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, pruritus, dry eyes and mouth, right upper quadrant discomfort.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disease, more common in women.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic destruction of intrahepatic bile ducts, leading to cirrhosis.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May have hepatomegaly, jaundice in later stages.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Primary sclerosing cholangitis, drug-induced liver injury
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Ursodeoxycholic acid, obeticholic acid for certain patients
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Monitor liver function, fat-soluble vitamin levels
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Jaundice, itching, fatigue, right upper quadrant pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Associated with inflammatory bowel disease, more common in men.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Chronic inflammation, fibrosis, and stricturing of bile ducts.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Endoscopic management of strictures, liver transplantation
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Surveillance for cholangiocarcinoma, management of associated IBD
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Often asymptomatic, may present with fatigue, jaundice, abdominal pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Blood-borne virus, risk factors include IV drug use, unsafe medical practices.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Viral hepatitis leading to chronic liver disease.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Possible mild hepatomegaly, otherwise often normal.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: differentialDiagnosis
fields.defaultValue: Other viral hepatitides, alcoholic liver disease
fields.label: Differential Diagnosis

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring for liver fibrosis, hepatocellular carcinoma screening
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Severe abdominal pain, fever, signs of peritonitis.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Can result from ulcer disease, diverticulitis, inflammatory bowel disease.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: A hole in the wall of the gastrointestinal tract.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Rigidity, rebound tenderness, guarding indicative of peritonitis.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Fatigue, jaundice, right upper quadrant pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Autoimmune disease, more common in women.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Liver inflammation that occurs when the immune system attacks the liver.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular liver function tests, liver biopsy as needed
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Neurological symptoms, psychiatric disturbances, liver disease.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Copper accumulation in tissues, particularly liver and brain.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: pregnancy
fields.defaultValue: Chelation therapy to remove excess copper
fields.label: Pregnancy

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of copper levels, neurological assessment
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Difficulty swallowing, regurgitation of undigested food, chest pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Unknown aetiology, involves degeneration of oesophageal nerves.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Pneumatic dilation, laparoscopic Heller myotomy, POEM (Peroral Endoscopic Myotomy)
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Abdominal pain, bloating, occasional bowel obstruction.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Inflammation and fibrosis of the mesentery.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Increased blood pressure in the portal venous system.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: Enlarged spleen, signs of chronic liver disease.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Beta-blockers, endoscopic variceal ligation, TIPS procedure
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Surveillance for varices, management of ascites
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Impaired blood flow out of the liver.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: treatment
fields.defaultValue: Anticoagulants, thrombolytic therapy, TIPS or liver transplantation for severe cases
fields.label: Treatment

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Regular monitoring of liver function, manage ascites
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Delayed gastric emptying without an obvious obstruction.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Diet modification, glycemic control in diabetics
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Difficulty swallowing, weight loss, chest pain, hoarseness.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: physicalExam
fields.defaultValue: May present with signs of weight loss.
fields.label: Physical Exam

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Ulcers in the stomach or duodenum.
fields.label: Systems Survey

fields.name: carePlan
fields.defaultValue: Avoid NSAIDs, limit alcohol, stop smoking
fields.label: Care Plan

fields.name: chiefComplaint
fields.defaultValue: Changes in bowel habits, rectal bleeding, abdominal pain.
fields.label: Chief Complaint

fields.name: socialHistory
fields.defaultValue: Age, family history, diet, lifestyle factors.
fields.label: Social History

fields.name: systemsSurvey
fields.defaultValue: Malignant neoplasm of the colon or rectum.

fields.defaultValue: Possible palpable mass on abdominal or rectal exam.
